title: An Addendum to the July 30, 2019 Episode of the Kirk Minihane Show
description:
This is an addendum to the July 30, 2019 episode of The Kirk Minihane Show submitted with apology to Cris Cyborg. The offer to let her punch Blind Mike for charity stands.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
